name: TWExtension22
description: build/release task to Run UI test with Testingwhiz
author: Cygnet Infotech

inputs.name: serverURL
inputs.label: Server URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: URL of the TestingWhiz Automation server in the format http://host:port/.

inputs.name: agentType
inputs.label: Agent Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select where to deploy your test execution from the following drop-down.

inputs.name: licenseKey
inputs.label: License Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Please provide a valid floating license key, in the following text box.

inputs.name: baseURL
inputs.label: Base URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: TestingWhiz BASEURL should starts with http://www... or https://www... .

inputs.name: targetType
inputs.label: Script Source
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target script source: File Path or Folder Path.

inputs.name: filePath
inputs.label: Script Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the TestingWhiz automation script file.

inputs.name: folderPath
inputs.label: Folder Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the TestingWhiz automation script Folder.

inputs.name: testObject
inputs.label: Test Object
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter testcase name to run only that testcase

inputs.name: reportDploy
inputs.label: Report Deploy
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path for to save the TestingWhiz Report.

inputs.name: browser
inputs.label: Browser
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the browser you wish to run the script on.

inputs.name: browsermicrosofthosted
inputs.label: Browser
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the browser you wish to run the script on.

inputs.name: stepExecutionInterval
inputs.label: Step Execution Interval
inputs.helpMarkDown: Interval between steps in milliseconds(to avoid errors if your site is slow).

inputs.name: reportInterval
inputs.label: Report Interval
inputs.helpMarkDown: Minimum time taken by any case of this script when executed in TestingWhiz tool. Value should be in milliseconds.

inputs.name: passFailPer
inputs.label: Pass '%'
inputs.helpMarkDown: Approved Passing Percentage for task to be succeed

inputs.name: captureFailureScreenshot
inputs.label: Capture Failure Screenshot
inputs.helpMarkDown: It will capture screenshot of failed Test Step.

inputs.name: captureConditionFailureScreenshot
inputs.label: Capture Condition Failure Screenshot
inputs.helpMarkDown: It will capture screenshot when conditional test step returns false.

inputs.name: mailReport
inputs.label: Mail Report ?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Send generated report to the mail. Note:- Please use output variable available in Output variable section in this plugin. If Output Variable section is not visible then use ${mailReportPath} to send report to mail.

inputs.name: rbtPriorityHigh
inputs.label: High
inputs.helpMarkDown: Executes High prioritize test cases

inputs.name: rbtPriorityMedium
inputs.label: Medium
inputs.helpMarkDown: Executes Medium mrioritize test cases

inputs.name: rbtPriorityLow
inputs.label: Low
inputs.helpMarkDown: Executes Low prioritize test cases

inputs.name: organisation
inputs.label: Organisation Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Add your organisation where you have to update testcase status.

inputs.name: username
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Add username of your account where you have to update testcase status.

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Add password of your account where you have to update testcase status.

inputs.name: project
inputs.label: Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the project.

inputs.name: plan
inputs.label: Plans
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the plans.

inputs.name: suit
inputs.label: Suits
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the suits.
